title: honor level 0
body: hi so i was suspended and now i am no longer suspended but my honor level is staying at 0 how many games do i need to play before i go back to getting honor reward's  again

replies.body: There is no specific amount of games, but your progression will depend on playing honorably.  If you have bad games while getting your honor back up, then it may slow down.  Consistency is key!
